general.gigTitle: do wordpress website development, design redesign, clone, landing page

sellerCard.description:
I’m Lemon, a dedicated and detail-oriented professional with over 5 years of experience in WordPress and Shopify development. I’ve successfully built 250+ websites for 150+ clients worldwide.

As a senior WordPress developer, I specialize in custom themes, plugin optimization, and delivering performance-driven websites. I also have extensive expertise in Shopify, creating seamless eCommerce platforms, solving server issues, and optimizing website speed.

Let’s collaborate to bring your ideas to life and create something exceptional for your business!

Thanks, Lemon

description.content:
Are you looking for a WordPress website design or revamp that is both contemporary and expert?


Look no further! Having worked in design for more than three years, I'm prepared to build a gorgeous WordPress Web-site that will elevate your company.


I provide WordPress knowledge, economical solutions, and first-rate customer support at a reasonable price.


My portfolio includes a wide range of websites, such as landing pages and personal blogs, portfolio sites, sales pages, news agencies, government web-sites, company websites, online stores, universities, physicians' web-sites, and many more.


Services I Offer:


  • Redesign Existing Web-site for Better Looks
  • Customized Unique Design Based on Your Business
  • Fully Responsive Design
  • Free SEO
  • eCommerce Functionality
  • Setup Any Payment Gateway
  • SEO Friendly Structure & Speed Optimization
  • Animation Effect
  • Site Transfer to Another Domain or Hosting
  • Social Media Integration


Why Me:


  • 5 Years of Experience
  • Quick and Professional
  • Unlimited Revisions
  • 30 Days Free Support


Act wisely and choose wisely! Why hold up in the order queue of a busy seller? Order now to take advantage of first-rate services.


Regards,

Lemon

slide.name: do wordpress website development, design redesign, clone, landing page

questionsAndAnswers.question: WHAT DO I NEED TO GET STARTED?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: It'll depend on the project. It is common for every project to have a domain and hosting login, and if you already have installed WordPress, then just WordPress login (some cases, Cpanel or FTP is needed), content, and logo. If you don't have any, don't worry. Just leave a message, I will help you

questionsAndAnswers.question: If I'm unhappy with your work or design,?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: I'm trying my best to make you satisfied. Unless you are 100% satisfied, I'll still make you unhappy, and you will get a 100% full payment refund.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you provide support after order completion?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, of course, your satisfaction is my priority. You can reach me anytime on Fiverr, even after order completion.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you provide Web hosting?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Web hosting is not included in this gig, but I can suggest you use the right hosting platform as per your requirements.

openGraph.title: do wordpress website development, design redesign, clone, landing page

reviews.comment: Lemon created a stunning portfolio website for my voice-over business. He captured exactly what I had in mind, and the site is both professional and easy to navigate.

seller_response.comment: It was a pleasure to meet your expectations. Thank you for your trust in my capabilities.

reviews.comment: Excellent work, and most importantly, very accommodating with various revision requests. I highly recommend Lemon if you want a website with a modern look and functionality. I will hire him again if further help is needed. Thank you again and again, Lemon!

seller_response.comment: Ty is highly professional and incredibly friendly throughout the project. His approach made the entire process smooth and enjoyable. I felt very comfortable working with him. Thank you!

reviews.comment: The team was incredibly patient and professional. They worked with me to ensure every detail of my website was perfect. The end result is a site that truly represents my brand.

seller_response.comment: Working with you has been a fantastic experience. Thank you for your clear communication and cooperation.

reviews.comment: Lemon produced a great website design for me. It was a big improvement on the old design I had. The site is more retail-focused, and more modern looking. I am very happy with the result. It was great working with Lemon again.

seller_response.comment: Your encouraging words mean a lot. Thank you for your confidence in my abilities.

reviews.comment: Lemon truly impressed me with his exceptional attention to detail and PROFESSIONALISM in website development. He demonstrated a DEEP UNDERSTANDING of the project and was a pleasure to collaborate with, communicating fluently and clearly throughout. The fast and efficient service, along with the helpful video tutorial he supplied, significantly exceeded my expectations—great work, Lemon! 👏

seller_response.comment: Outstanding experience again. Thank you for the valuable feedback. Looking forward to working with you again.

reviews_snippet.comment: Working with Lemon was a fantastic experience! The project was bug-free with meticulous attention to detail and excellent documentation. Lemon's politeness and exceptional cooperation truly went above and beyond—HIGHLY recommend! 👍

Lemon has been a true professional from the start. My knowledge of websites is extremely limited, Lemon essentially took me by the hand and delivered a website that superceded my expectations!
If you're looking for an outstanding website with all the SEO bits built in and more then definitely give Lemon a shout!
5*

Lemon is a fantastic person to work with. From start to finish everything is handled so professionally and proactively going above and beyond. Don’t hesitate to get in touch and work with a true professional.
Lemon created a fantastic website for my non-profit business. He understood my needs, communicated well, and delivered a professional result. I'm very pleased!
My experience with this seller was excellent. The delivery arrived within the promised timeline and matched the description perfectly. I wouldn't hesitate to purchase from them again!
